TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DateTimeEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: This date time editor is a suitable for visually editing <xref:System.DateTime> objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: A type descriptor context that can be used to provide additional context information.
A service provider object through which editing services may be obtained.
An instance of the value being edited.
Docs.summary: Edits the specified object value using the editor style provided by GetEditorStyle. A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object hasn't changed, this should return the same object it was passed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle GetEditStyle(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: A type descriptor context that can be used to provide additional context information.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the editing style of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DateTimeEditor.EditValue%2A> method. If the method is not supported, this will return None.
Docs.returns: An value indicating the provided editing style.
